TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to notify the removal of an IED discovery IEDEvent and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand and process it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates an IED discovery IEDEvent. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer sends a notification inferring the removal of this IEDEvent. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Event message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the IEDEvent information is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (1) creates an IEDEvent with name XXX_RIED_922.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the IEDEvent: NLD_RIED_921.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer (1) sends a notification inferring the removal of this IEDEvent.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive the removal notification and interpret it correctly.
